game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Explore the ancient ruins and uncover its secrets.
game.description: A long-abandoned temple has been unearthed, filled with mysterious artifacts and treasures. Brave adventurers are needed to explore the site, overcome challenges, and unlock its hidden riches.

tasks.description: Remove the rubble blocking the temple's entrance to gain access.
Study the murals depicting a long-forgotten civilization to uncover clues about the temple's layout and hidden dangers.
Find and collect the fabled Golden Idol, said to grant immense power and wealth.
